title: Normal Burglar
content:
Normal Burglar is a level 18 Watchman fightable monster who appears in the Detective skill training activity Crime Den Raids. They appear in both male and female variants with equal stats. Their attack style is Impact, there are no vulnerabilities listed.

Normal Burglars appear in groups of five and will be hostile to the player after a short dialogue ('Prepare to be arrested') following breaking to their hideout.
